mapper.insert: insert into "post" ( post_id, uid, main_category, post_text, photo_url, expense, location, public_type_no) values ( #{postId}, #{uid}, #{mainCategory}, #{postText}, #{photoUrl}, #{expense}, #{location}, #{publicTypeNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, u.uid, u.username, u.profile_image_url, p.main_category, ps1.sub_category AS subCategory1, ps2.sub_category AS subCategory2, p.post_text, p.photo_url, p.expense, p.location, p.public_type_no, p.created_at FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.uid = u.uid LEFT JOIN post_subcategory ps1 ON p.post_id = ps1.post_id AND ps1.subcategory_no = '1' LEFT JOIN post_subcategory ps2 ON p.post_id = ps2.post_id AND ps2.subcategory_no = '2' WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}

SELECT p.post_id, u.uid, u.username, u.profile_image_url, p.main_category, ps1.sub_category AS subCategory1, ps2.sub_category AS subCategory2, p.post_text, p.photo_url, p.expense, p.location, p.public_type_no, p.created_at, CASE WHEN f.uid IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isFavorite FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.uid = u.uid LEFT JOIN post_subcategory ps1 ON p.post_id = ps1.post_id AND ps1.subcategory_no = '1' LEFT JOIN post_subcategory ps2 ON p.post_id = ps2.post_id AND ps2.subcategory_no = '2' LEFT JOIN favorite f ON p.post_id = f.post_id AND f.uid = #{uid} WHERE p.uid = #{postUid} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT 50
